modules.name: Audio-8
modules.description: Sends audio and CV to/from an audio device

modules.name: Audio-16
modules.description: Sends audio and CV to/from an audio device

modules.name: MIDI-CV
modules.description: Converts MIDI from an external device to CV and gates

modules.name: MIDI-CC
modules.description: Converts MIDI CC from an external device to CV

modules.name: MIDI-Gate
modules.description: Converts MIDI notes from an external device to gates

modules.name: MIDI-Map
modules.description: Controls parameters (knobs, sliders, switches) directly with MIDI CC

modules.name: CV-MIDI
modules.description: Converts CV to MIDI and sends to an external device

modules.name: CV-CC
modules.description: Converts CV to MIDI CC and sends to an external device

modules.name: CV-Gate
modules.description: Converts gates to MIDI notes and sends to an external device

modules.name: Notes
modules.description: Write text for patch notes or artist attribution
